test_seven_reds module¶

class test_seven_reds.TestSevenReds(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

setUp()¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

tearDown()¶

Hook method for deconstructing the test fixture after testing it.

test_martingale_system()¶

Assures that the martingale system is being followed along with the seven reds logic.

test_placeBets()¶

Assures that no bets have been placed until 7 reds have been seen.

test_winners()¶

Checks the updation of red_count variable is down correctly for various sequences of reds and blacks.
